Package org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.expr

Package Expr Contains all high level XPath expressions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbsExpression AbstractExpression Template for all expressions.
AndExpr Logical And Expression The logical and expression performs a logical conjunction of the boolean values of two input sequences.
CastableExpr CastableExpression The castable expression tests whether a given value is castable into a given target type.
EveryExpr EveryExpr IAxis that represents the quantified expression "every".
InstanceOfExpr InstanceOfExpr The boolean instance of expression returns true if the value of its first operand matches the SequenceType in its second operand, according to the rules for SequenceType matching; otherwise it returns false.
LiteralExpr LiteralExpr Expression that holds a literal.
OrExpr Logical Or Expression The logical or expression performs a logical disjunction of the boolean values of two input sequences.
SomeExpr Some expression IAxis that represents the quantified expression "some".
VarRefExpr VarRefExpr Reference to the current item of the variable expression.
 

Package org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.expr Description

Package Expr

Contains all high level XPath expressions.

Make sure to extend AbstractExpression for all expressions, that always return a singleton, like logical, literal or quantifier expressions. For all other expression the AbstractAxis has to be extended.

Author:
Tina Scherer, University of Konstanz
